bug.question: I have six legs and like to buzz around flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 I help plants make seeds.
🍯 I make something sweet that you can eat.
🐝 I am black and yellow and live in a hive.

bug.question: I build my home with sticks and leaves, and I march in a line. Who am I?

hints.text: 💪 I can carry things much bigger than myself.
🐜 I live in a colony with lots of others.
Picnic is my favorite location

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar, then I wrap myself in a cocoon, and finally I fly away with beautiful wings. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I eat leaves when I'm young.
🎨 I am often very colorful.
🦋 I can fly away

bug.question: I have a red shell with black spots. I'm considered lucky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 Farmers like me because I eat other bugs.
⚫ My spots help me hide from predators.
I am red and small

bug.question: I hop around in grassy fields and make a chirping sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I eat plants.
🦵 I have strong legs for jumping.
I live outside and hop

bug.question: I light up at night with a bright glow. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I use my light to attract a mate.
🌙 I am most active when it's dark.
I light up the night

bug.question: I am a master of disguise, blending in with leaves and twigs. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 My body looks like a plant.
🌳 I can be hard to spot.
I love trees.

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my dinner. Who am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I have eight legs but I'm not an insect.
🕷️ I can be found in corners and gardens.
🕸️ I can walk on walls

bug.question: I am a buzzing insect that loves to drink blood. What am I?

hints.text: 🦟 I leave itchy bites.
💦 I like to live near water.
I buzz and bite

bug.question: I munch on wood, and can cause damage to houses. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I live in colonies.
🪵 I like to eat wood
I have strong jaws

cosmos.question: I'm big and bright, and I come out at night. I reflect the sun's light, but have no light of my own. What am I?

hints.text: 🧀 Some people think I'm made of cheese!
🐺 Werewolves love to howl at me.
🌚 I change shape throughout the month.

cosmos.question: I am a giant ball of fire, giving light and warmth to the Earth. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 Plants need me to grow.
😎 You need to wear sunglasses when I'm out.
🌇 I set in the West and rise in the East.

cosmos.question: I am the planet we live on. I have lots of water and land. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 You are on me right now!
💧 I am mostly covered in water.
🌍 I'm the third planet from the sun.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 Some are named after animals.
🔭 You can see me better with a telescope.
✨ The Big Dipper is one example of me.

cosmos.question: I am a rocky object that orbits the sun, but I'm much smaller than a planet. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ Sometimes I have a tail when I get close to the Sun.
💥 I can create a big crater if I hit a planet.
🪐 I am found in the asteroid belt

cosmos.question: I am the closest planet to the Sun. I am very hot! What am I?

hints.text: 🌡️ It would be hard to live on me!
🚀 I am the fastest planet to orbit the sun
🪐 People might think I am made of liquid metal, it's just a rumor.

cosmos.question: I am a giant storm on Jupiter that has been raging for hundreds of years. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I am very colorful!
🪐 I am wider than the Earth.
💨 I am a spinning wind

cosmos.question: I am a group of billions of stars, gas, and dust held together by gravity. Our solar system is part of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌌 I am very, very big!
✨ Spiral, elliptical, and irregular are types of me.
🥛 Our Sun is just one star in our type of me.

cosmos.question: I am a place beyond Neptune filled with icy objects, including dwarf planets. What am I?

hints.text: 🥶 I am very cold.
🚀 New Horizons explored objects within me.
🪐 Pluto is one of the largest objects within me.

cosmos.question: I am what happens when a very large star runs out of fuel and collapses, creating a region of spacetime with such strong gravity that nothing, not even light, can escape. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I am invisible, but my effects are not.
🌌 I'm a very mysterious object
🕳️ Scientists are still working to understand me completely.
